original_text: And he defeated Moab and he measured them with a line, making them lie down on the ground. Two lines he measured to be put to death, and one full line to be spared. And the Moabites became servants to David and brought tribute.
korean_text: 다윗이 또 모압을 쳐서 그들에게 땅에 엎드리게 하고 줄로 재어 그 두 줄 길이의 사람은 죽이고 한 줄 길이의 사람들은 살리니 모압 사람들이 다윗의 종들이 되어 조공을 드리니라

sentences.original_text: and he measured them with a line
making them lie down on the ground
Two lines he measured to be put to death
and one full line to be spared
And the Moabites became servants to David
